dk.statsbiblioteket.util.console
Class Formatter

java.lang.Object
  dk.statsbiblioteket.util.console.Formatter

public class Formatter
extends java.lang.Object

A string type that can render colored and formatted output to a console.

Constructor Summary
Formatter()
          Create a formatter with the default settings.
Formatter(Color fg)
          Create a formatter with a preset foreground colour.
Formatter(Color fg, Color bg)
          Create a formatter with preset foreground and background colours.
Formatter(Color fg, Color bg, Hint hint)
          Create a formatter with preset foreground and background colours as well as display hints.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String format(java.lang.String s)
          Return a formatted representation of the string with colours and hints applied.

 void reset()
          Clear all hints, for-, or background colors.
 void setBackground(Color color)
          Set the text's background color
 void setForeground(Color color)
          Set the text color of the string.
 void setHint(Hint hint)
          Set a hint that modifies how the string is printed.
